description.value:
(Clinical Focus: Codes used to represent the second tier of basic infection control used in addition to standard precautions for certain patients infected or colonized with pathogens requiring additional precautions to prevent transmission of infectious pathogens. See https://www.cdc.gov/infectioncontrol/pdf/guidelines/isolation-guidelines-H.pdf for further details.),(Data Element Scope: Data element representing the second tier of basic infection control used in addition to standard precautions for certain patients infected or colonized with pathogens requiring additional precautions to prevent transmission of infectious pathogens.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hierarchy descending from the SNOMED CT code 409583003 |Transmission-based precautions (procedure).),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
This value set was imported on 6/10/2019 with a version of 20190425.
